pkgmetadata.longdescription: SQLAlchemy store formula-aware implementation. It stores its triples in the following partitions: * Asserted non rdf:type statements * Asserted rdf:type statements (in a table which models Class membership). The motivation for this partition is primarily improved query speed and scalability as most graphs will always have more rdf:type statements than others. * All Quoted statements In addition it persists namespace mappings in a separate table
